研究揭示了美国预期寿命的鲜明教育差异超过二十年一项研究表明，在美国，教育水平的预期寿命差距扩大，强调需要公平地接受教育作为健康决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-Stark-educational-disparities-iendiSparities-in-us-us-life-pectectancy-expectancy-prectancy-vorcy-over-two-decades.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250128/study-reveals-Stark-educational-disparities-disparities-in-us-us-life-pectectancy-evectancy-evectancy-everancy-ever-two-decades.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fae64b5-3644-49EF-9A89-76058BC63B1E Tue, 28 Jan 2025 04:53:00 -0500 Study reveals stark educational disparities in US life expectancy over two decades
Sphere Flicics推出了Cyto-Mine Chroma并宣布早期访问计划Sphere Flingics是基于创新的Picodroplet的领先提供商，用于功能性单细胞分析和隔离的微流体解决方案，今天宣布推出Cyto-Mine®Chroma，并在SLAS2025国际会议和圣地亚哥的展览会上开放了其早期访问计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/sphere-fluidics-launches-cyto-cyto-mine-chroma-and-announces-announces-early-Access-cess-program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/sphere-fluidics-launches-cyto-cyto-mine-chroma-and-announces-announces-early-early-access-cess-program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b888d32d-5E39-4388-9EB2-708CDE8C6FF3 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 22:52:00 -0500 Sphere Fluidics launches Cyto-Mine Chroma and announces Early Access Program
人工智能工具显示出改善老化干预措施和建议的潜力新加坡国立大学（NUS Medicine）的Yong Lin医学院研究人员与德国Rostock大学医学中心医学与老化研究的生物统计学和信息学研究所的研究人员之间的合作研究，研究了高级AI工具，例如大型语言模型（LLMS）可以使评估衰老干预措施并提供个性化建议变得更加容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ai-tools-show-potential-to-to-to-to-interventions-interventions-anderventions-and-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/ai-tools-show-potential-to-to--improve-aging-gage-interventions-inderventions-and-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c91bd214-9949-4D29-95C5-D75C5-D75EF97ECFD2 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:44:53 -0500 AI tools show potential to improve aging interventions and recommendations
希伯来高级生物的狼中心达到2级对年龄友好的卫生系统状态新英格兰最大的高级医疗保健和生活社区的非营利组织提供商以及哈佛医学院唯一的高级护理组织宣布，其Deanna和Sidney Wolk Memory Health Center已得到医疗保健改善研究所（IHI）认可，希伯来语高级生物居住。作为对年龄友好的卫生系统（2级），致力于卓越的护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/hebrew-seniorlifes-wolk-center-achieves-achieves-level-2-2----- age-age-age-frightly-health-health-systemstatus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/hebrew-seniorlifes-wolk-center-achieves-center-achieves-level-2-------- fig-2-age-gage-frightly-health-systemstatus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb2e0427-6f6e-4458-4458-AD19-6D1555222709 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:39:40 -0500 Hebrew SeniorLife's Wolk Center achieves level 2 Age-Friendly Health System status
农村诊所大大提高了支持计划的丁丙诺啡处方尽管取消了X-waiver的要求，该要求曾经限制了临床医生为阿片类药物使用障碍（OUD）开了丁丙诺啡，但目前只有一小部分初级保健临床医生目前为Oud（MOUD）开了药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/rural-clinics-siminfification--boost-buprenorphine prescressing-supportragram.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/rural-clinics-simpimancification--boost-buprenorphine prescressing-supprogram.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9402fc0e-a082-41e2-96f9-deb1b1b5e72ea1 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:36:48 -0500

大流行与枪支住院的显着增加有关密歇根大学的一项新大学的一项新的研究发现，在COVID-19开始大流行之前的五年中，将受害者送往医院的枪支受伤已经稳步下降，但在接下来的两年中，急剧逆转了路线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/pandemic-linked-to-siminciment-riseant-rise-in-firearm-hospitalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/pandemic-linked-to-significant-rise-rise-in-firearm-hospitalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20d2130f-dcfa-4DFA-8761-5D2B88FEC737 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:29:20 -0500 Pandemic linked to significant rise in firearm hospitalizations
年轻人开始工作时体育锻炼和睡眠方式急剧变化剑桥大学科学家领导的新研究说，当年轻人开始工作时，他们的日常体育锻炼数量会急剧增加，只是在新的几年中再次掉下来，而剑桥大学科学家领导的新研究却略有跌落。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/physical-activity-and-sleep-patterns-change-sharge-sharge-sharge-sharge-sharply-when-young-adults-begin-begin-work.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/physical-activity-and-sleep-patterns-change-shange-sharge-sharge-hange-when-------------------------young-aidults-begin-begin-work.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71E10274-4653-4180-B734-BBB8D77EB9C8C Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:19:52 -0500 Physical activity and sleep patterns change sharply when young adults begin work
定期的GP访问可以帮助减少实践和医院的工作量新的研究表明，经常看到相同的全科医生可以减少实践和医院的工作量，从而有可能释放患者的约会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/regular-gp-visits-could-help-reduce-workload-in-proload-in-practices-and-practices-and-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/regular-gp-visits-could-help-reduce-workload-in-proad-in-practices-and-practices-and-practices-and-hostals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=619ccc6a-09fc-4fd9-88ae-7C80D5388A5C Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:14:00 -0500 Regular GP visits could help reduce workload in practices and hospitals
按需采购第500个移植器官庆祝里程碑今天宣布的Procure on Demand第500个移植器官象征着当前移植系统中的差距和效率低下，器官恢复，技术和物流公司定期解决。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/procure-on-demand-celebrates-milestone-milestone-with-500th-transplant-transplant-organ.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250127/procure-procure-on-demand-celebrates-milestone-milestone-with-500th-transplant-transplant-ransplant-organ.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2AC7D32-6780-403F-97E5-FAAAA6E6E122747 Mon, 27 Jan 2025 21:04:40 -0500 ProCure On-Demand celebrates milestone with 500th transplanted organ
